title: Bayonetta 3 Reviews: Nintendo’s Fall Hit? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.25.22
description:
Is Bayonetta 3 yet another game of the year contender? Blessing and Tim talk about that, Laura Bailey wanting to return as Abby in The Last of Us, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:22 - Housekeeping

The first OFFICIAL Kinda Funny Podcast from The Spare Bedroom is now live. You can catch that in the regular places.

ALSO, VODs from the Spare Bedroom launch stream have started uploading. Over on Youtube.com/KindaFunny you can find the KF Court segment featuring Elyse and James, meanwhile on Kinda Funny Games, KFW featuring Sisqo is up right now.

ALSO ALSO, after today's episode of KFGD, Greg is busting ghosts in Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed with a full crew! If you miss it live, catch the archive on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!

The Roper Report  -

00:06:00 - Bayonetta Review Round Up
00:23:45 - A new Pokemon has been revealed!
00:25:23 - The hierarchy of power in Multiversus is about to change
00:28:27 - Ad
00:30:23 - The Last of Us’ Abby actor says she would ‘definitely’ play the role again
00:33:35 - TLOU2 SPOILERS
00:35:34 - Microsoft ‘wants its own Genshin Impact-like game’ for Xbox
00:41:17 - Disco Elysium author Robert Kurvitz's company files lawsuit against ZA/UM
00:49:00 - Out today
00:51:22 - “Do you think Midnight Suns is going to be fun?” - Jonathan Shapiro
00:56:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Greg
